not-started.name: Not started
not-started.description: This is where you’ll start. Watch videos and practice skills if you’re new to the material or jump to a quiz or unit test if you feel more confident.

attempted.name: Attempted
attempted.description: If you get less than 70% correct when practicing a skill or if you get questions related to this skill incorrect on a quiz or unit test you’ll be here.

familiar.name: Familiar
familiar.description: Get 70% or more correct when practicing a skill. Or, correctly answer a question related to a skill on a quiz or unit test.

proficient.name: Proficient
proficient.description: Answer 100% of the questions correct when practicing a skill or get a Familiar skill correct during a quiz or unit test.

mastered.name: Mastered
mastered.description: Get a Proficient skill correct on the unit test.
